I've started adding links to urlLink GEMM in the tracklistings for the mixtapes. There's also a search box at the bottom of the page that you can use to search their database. With over 19 million CDs, LPs, 45s and more from sellers around the world, this is one of your best bets for finding that hard to find track you've been looking for.
(Link Expired) the full 3 cd set in 128 kbps .ogg format. You'll need a bit torrent client, I recommend urlLink Azureus. urlLink Tracker Info

From the page: Congress is considering a sequel to the RAVE Act that is even more draconian than the first. If enacted, the Ecstasy Awareness Act would throw people in jail who organize raves or similar electronic dance events if some of their customers used drugs. Fax your Representative and tell him or her not to co-sponsor this dangerous bill. urlLink Click Here to learn more.
I've started adding links in the sidebar to the pages of my friends from urlLink Stumbleupon . If you'd like to have your site listed here urlLink email me.

Each volume is approximately 75 minutes long. Click on the artist name or song title to search the GEMM database for that selection.
